column4: is there a way to change the delay when clicking on system, preferences etc...
yes, it became slow after i set 2 separate x screens :)
try 'compiz --replace' .. that always works for me
not sure what the right answer is.. I usally try some combintation of disabling GL desktop and running 'compiz --replace' and eventually it works.. i dont reboot much =)
there's a page out there if you search for dual monitors and delay .. in the ubuntu forums .. havent kept up with it, but lots of fixes generally like what im saying.
should i disable desktop effects first ?
try that, yeah .. not sure if it'll work for you.. some combo of disabling gl desktop and that command always works for me =/
